amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds by various states to prevent any of them from implementing their own laws that authorize the use, distribution, possessions, or cultivation of marijuana on non-Federal lands within their respective jurisdictions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by various states to prevent any of them from implementing their own laws that authorize the use, distribution, possessions, or cultivation of marijuana on non-Federal lands within their respective jurisdictions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A066) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 222 (Roll no. 285).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A066) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 222 (Roll no. 285).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. McClintock.
